Ice Guardian

The Ice Guardian is a mob in Remixed Dungeon's Ice Caves. It's a formidable opponent with strong cold-based abilities.

Basic Information

  • Type: Guardian/Boss minion
  • Level: High-level enemy found in Ice Caves
  • HP: High HP pool
  • Attack: Powerful melee with strong freezing effect
  • Defense: Strong physical and magical defense
  • Speed: Slow speed

Mechanics

  • Freezing Attack: Strongly applies freezing status effect on hit
  • Boss Minion: Often found protecting the Ice Guardian Core boss
  • Ice Resistance: High resistance to cold-based attacks
  • Damage Type: High physical damage with freezing effects
  • Tactical Positioning: Often found in strategic positions

Strategy

  • Bring strong fire-based attacks for increased effectiveness
  • Prepare for strong freezing effects
  • High-level equipment recommended for engagement
  • Fire-enchanted weapons are especially effective
  • Consider crowd control to separate from other enemies

Loot

  • May drop rare materials related to Ice Caves
  • Good treasure chance

Code Reference

  • IceGuardian.java - Implementation
  • MobFactory.java:233 - Registration
  • IceGuardian strings - String resources

Related Mobs

  • Ice Guardian Core - Related boss mob
  • Ice Elemental - Similar cold abilities
  • Fire Elemental - Opposing elemental
